description: Try our easy to follow Roast Chicken Pieces with Sage & Pumpkin recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast Chicken Pieces with Sage & Pumpkin
name: Roast Chicken Pieces with Sage & Pumpkin Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roast for 30 minutes. Add zucchini and beans and gently toss to coat with the pan juices. Return to the oven for a further 10 minutes or until chicken is golden brown and cooked through. Serve dish with lemon and parsley.
